title: BBC Local Live: Derbyshire on Friday 10 February 2017 - BBC News
summary: man in court over city centre manslaughter .
artists record andy potter thank you video .
hughes and bryson set to return for rams .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 monday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's it for local live for today - and for this week .
we 'll be back on monday at 08:00 .

documents.title: friday night weather
text: remaining cold tonight with a few sleet or snow showers .
a covering of snow is possible above 200m and for some of us it could be a white start even at lower levels.. a widespread frost will also develop with lows of -1c ( 30f ) .
author: Sara Blizzard
BBC Weather

documents.title: latest headlines for derbyshire and east staffordshire
text: here 's a final recap of our top stories today :
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: gritters being deployed
text: more chilly weather is on the way !
find out the forecast and when we 're # gritting on the # newsroom # ice

documents.title: witness appeal over sus car fire
text: a car fire in burton last night is believed to have been caused by something being thrown at the vehicle - which set it alight .
the car , which was parked on the driveway of a house on suffolk road , was left as a burnt-out shell .
it 's being examined by forensic officers and police are appealing for witnesses who were in the area at around 21:00 .
author: Rory Gallimore
BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: travel : palterton route closed
text: rylah hill in palterton is closed between main street and the m1 following a crash .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: avoid a valentine 's day poisoning
text: oh i do n't know , what about giving someone a tender back rub while they 're being sick ?
there 's nothing romantic about food poisoning .
choose a 5rated eatery this # valentines
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man in court over oliver falivena killing
text: a man has appeared in court charged with the manslaughter of a father who died after being attacked in derby city centre .
oliver falivena ( was found with head injuries in market place in september and died later in hospital .
richard last , 31 , from spondon , has been bailed and will appear at derby crown court on 10 march .
author: Rory Gallimore
BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: city gets new bowling alley
text: a £ 2.4 million bowling alley is due to open at intu derby in less than eight weeks ' time .
author: Derby Telegraph

documents.title: water worries should be over
text: severn trent has been in touch to let us know supplies are back to normal in long eaton , belper , alfreton and ripley .
it said in a statement : our teams were carrying out work connecting a customer to our water network in derby .
`` to allow us to do this work , we had to interrupt the water supply for a very short period of time which we let our customers know about .
this work is now complete , with all customers water supplies back on .
also this afternoon , we 've been doing some emergency work to fix a pipe on wilmott street , long eaton .
`` this is now also all complete , and the road is completely clear .
although we did need to interrupt the water supply for a very short time ( around an hour ) , we did let all customers know , and we had no calls to say anyone was affected . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : m1 crash
text: a lane is closed on the m1 northbound between j29a and j30 following a crash .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: watch : the 85-year-old boxer
text: check out jeanie hughes from holbrook .
she 's started boxing with her granddaughter amanda to get herself back into shape after two hip replacements .
the pair said the exercise was great fun and a good excuse to spend time together .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your questions : under-promoted arboretum ?
text: the debate continues on facebook after tony gascoigne got in touch through your questions to ask why the city council did n't make more of a fuss about derby arboretum being britain 's first public park .
steve kennedy wrote : `` the area around this beautiful park is not what it was and as such the parks reputation has declined over the years , which is a real shame .

`` on the plus side efforts have been made by the police to clean the area up somewhat , there are public events on the park on a regular basis , resident artists work from the buildings within the park and there is a friends of arboretum park group that meet up regularly . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: gritters in action again
text: wintry showers are forecast for derbyshire so our gritters will be out this afternoon and patrolling again overnight
wo n't be doing our road though , despite having dangerous slopes at both ends when icy ! !

documents.title: 'you can get so many benefits from it ' # peoplescup
text: england player alex scott `` would 've loved the opportunity to have a competition like this when i was younger '' .
what 's she talking about ?
the fa people 's cup - the country 's biggest free five-a-side competition which gives you the chance to make your way to wembley .
`` when i was younger , playing in a football cage , the dream was always to play at wembley , '' adds scott .
`` the fa people 's cup gives anyone the opportunity to sign up to a local team in your area .
you do n't have to rely on your mates .
`` it 's a chance to meet different people , socialise in different environments .
it 's more than just signing up , you can get so many benefits from it . ''
so what are you waiting for ?
sign up for the fa people 's cup - but hurry as the deadline for entries is the 19 february !

documents.title: bogus water workers targeted elderly pair
text: two men stole cash from an elderly couple after knocking on their door and pretending they were water company workers who needed to check their supply .
police said the theft happened on briars way in ripley on 30 january .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: more water problems
text: the water supply in alfreton , ripley and belper has been disrupted due to an emergency repair , severn trent water says .
a similar issue is still affecting the supply in long eaton .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your photos : snow in derbyshire
text: looks like we 've had a little snow in alfreton , thanks to weather watcher nigel 99 for the
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: listen : mac previews robins clash
text: here 's my full interview with steve mcclaren ahead of rams v bristol city .
author: Owen Bradley
BBC Radio Derby Sport

documents.title: clement bounces back from rams sacking
text: here 's a little more on former rams boss paul clement being named the top premier league boss for january .
he took charge of the rams in august 2015 but was sacked after just eight months .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: councils feeling fearful over future finances
text: a new survey has found most councils in the east midlands are worried about the future of their finances .
the figures came from an anonymous survey by the local government information unit , which provides a snapshot of how councils are coping .
of the authorities that responded , 94 % said they 'll be forced to increase council tax for residents to help deal with pressures such as social care and housing .
author: East Midlands Today

documents.title: travel : raynesway partially blocked
text: there 's been a crash on the northbound side of raynesway in derby between the a52 and a6 .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: long eaton water problem
text: people in long eaton have been told they may have no water supply or poor pressure for a bit while severn trent water carries out an emergency repair .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your questions : does derby arboretum need more promotion ?
text: we 've had plenty of comments on facebook after tony gascoigne used your questions to ask why more effort was n't being put into promoting derby arboretum - the first public park in britain .
william breslin posted : `` the sad truth is that a park reflects the area in which it is set .
the area has gone downhill over the last 60 years .
some people are afraid to go there because the area is something of a ghetto . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: this afternoon 's weather
text: generally cloudy with a few light showers as well that are likely to fall as a mix of wet snow , sleet and rain .
only occasional breaks in the cloud with highs of 3c ( 37f ) .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: 'crash for cash ' trial : jury sent out
text: the jury has retired to consider its verdicts in the trial of six men accused of causing deliberate collisions across derbyshire as part of an insurance scam .
it 's alleged they targeted older people and lone women drivers , with ten of the 41 collisions taking place at or near markeaton island in derby .
the defendants deny all the charges at nottingham crown court .
author: Sally Swinfen
BBC Radio Derby newsreader

documents.title: fake twitter account warning
text: unlike scooby doo 's account which has been verified by twitter .
we 've been advised by sadiq el fitouri that the twitter account set up in his name is not a genuine one .
he does not have a twitter account .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: racist chant group 'spat at woman '
text: police want to speak to this man after a woman was spat at while challenging a group of men over racist chanting on a train .
the alleged assault took place on the 20:03 leeds to birmingham service as it passed through derby on saturday .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: multiple cars involved in hit-and-run smash
text: a late night crash saw five cars wrecked in a hit and run in woodville .
author: Burton Mail

documents.title: your questions : why do n't we promote derby arboretum ?
text: mill owner joseph strutt gifted the arboretum to the people of derby to show his gratitude for their hard work that had made his family rich .
work started in july 1839 and it opened in september 1840 when the whole town was given the day off to celebrate its arrival .
tony gascoigne asked via your questions why more is n't made of its history .
we 've put it to the city council and are awaiting a response .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: shop radios 'help police swoop faster '
text: heanor police officer sam king said the walkie talkies allowed traders to summon help almost instantly if they encountered a shoplifter , rather than having to ring a call centre .
he said : `` because the police station in heanor is so central , we can get out to them probably within a minute , if not less . ''
author: Alex Blakemore
Reporter, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: radio scheme expanded after shoplifting spike
text: extra walkie talkies have been given out to shops across amber valley following a 15 % rise in shoplifting over the past year .
the radios allow traders to report sus activity to each other and the police .
author: Alex Blakemore
Reporter, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: charity run to plug school 's funding shortfall
text: a 'deprived ' chesterfield school which is facing huge funding cuts has resorted to charity to pay the bills .
author: Derbyshire Times

documents.title: ex-rams manager wins top boss award
text: former derby county boss paul clement has won the barclays manager of the month award just a few weeks after taking charge of swansea city .
author: Owen Bradley
BBC Radio Derby Sport

documents.title: snow expected later
text: heads up - the met office has issued a yellow warning for snow in derbyshire from 18:00 today to 10:00 tomorrow .
it says we could get up to 10cm on higher ground .
hope our weather watchers have their cameras ready .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: missing teenager found
text: police say missing 17-year-old kain smith was found safe and well in derby last night .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: listen : scott carson on bristol city
text: here 's my interview with rams goalkeeper scott carson ahead of tomorrow 's bristol city match .
he says derby county 's home form has been instrumental in keeping them in touch with the play-offs .
author: Owen Bradley
BBC Radio Derby Sport

documents.title: andy potter shown thank you video
text: there was laughter and tears as andy potter was shown the thank you video recorded by local artists .
after watching it from his hospital bed , the broadcaster quipped that it felt `` a bit like this is your life '' .
he added : `` that was just amazing .
thank you to everyone . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your questions : why is n't arboretum more well-known ?
text: derby arboretum was the first public park in britain but tony gascoigne has used your questions to ask why it is n't more famous as a result .
we 've asked the city council what efforts are being made to promote the grade ii-listed park 's historic standing and will let you know when we hear back .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: football club 's marketing boss departs
text: the derbyshire times 's chesterfield reporter has just tweeted this .
the club is currently up for sale .
chesterfield have parted ways with their head of commercial and marketing richard nichols .
he was appointed in august # spireites
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : artists say thanks to andy potter
text: here 's a short clip from the thank you video recorded by artists in derby for terminally ill bbc radio derby presenter andy potter .
you can see the full six minutes on the furthest from the sea facebook page .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: bar reopened after three decades closed
text: the belfry bar at the old bell in derby has reopened as a restaurant after being closed for about thirty years .
it was previously known as tuppence , ha'penny millionaires and was popular with the city 's movers and shakers .
author: Heidi Booth
Journalist, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: latest headlines for derbyshire and east staffordshire
text: here 's a reminder of our top stories so far this morning :
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'sus man prompts school warning
text: a warning has been issued to parents after a man was seen acting sus outside a secondary school .
author: Derby Telegraph

documents.title: saying thanks to 'a fantastic bloke '
text: the thank you video for andy potter was the idea of derby musician matt mcguinness , who filmed it at the city 's guildhall theatre ,
he said : `` i really hope it reinforces what everyone thinks about him , that everyone 's grateful for the support he 's given us .
`` i hope he takes some comfort and some solace in how many people have such a deep feeling about how fantastic a bloke he is . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: derby artists say thank you to andy potter
text: members of derby 's arts community have made a video thanking bbc radio derby presenter andy potter for his support over the years .
the broadcaster was diagnosed with incurable cancer two weeks ago .

documents.title: your questions : why are derby 's taxis yellow ?
text: paul muir used your questions to ask why derby 's hackney carriages roam the streets in a bright yellow paint job .
according to the city council , it 's nothing to do with nodding to new york 's famous yellow cabs , and all to do with making it easier for people to spot them .
back in 2001 they held talks with taxi drivers across the city , which led to the change in colour .
a spokesman said the switch has been a success '' , and most locals do n't seem to mind .
get in touch with any more of your questions you want us to answer .
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

documents.title: fit squad for rams
text: derby county boss steve mcclaren will have 20 fit outfield players to choose from for the first all season when they face bristol city tomorrow .
both will hughes and craig bryson should be available for the rams , whose next three games are at home .
author: Owen Bradley
BBC Radio Derby Sport

documents.title: travel : lorry breakdown causing delays
text: a broken down lorry is partially blocking an entry slip road onto uttoxeter new road in derby at the manor road junction .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: world 'moving forward ' accepting transgender people
text: talulah ( has said her participation in the tv show is a step forward for society .
`` it is television history , '' the 22-year-old told bbc radio derby .
`` a transgender person has never been on a show like this before and it shows that the world and industry is moving forward . ''
`` i 'm proud to be the mark of that change . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : friday 's weather
text: here 's today 's forecast

documents.title: transgender contestant in tv first
text: a 22-year-old woman from burton has said she is making tv history by being the first transgender contestant on britain 's next top model .
talulah eve brown will be competing in the next series along with 11 other girls , who are all fighting for the chance to win a modelling contract .
author: Sally Swinfen
BBC Radio Derby newsreader

documents.title: good morning : welcome to today 's live updates
text: good morning and welcome along to friday across derbyshire and east staffordshire .
i 'll be with you until later with the region 's news , sport , weather and travel .
if you would like to share your and stories then please get in touch via facebook , twitter or email .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live
